nodes.text: The Fate's Hand Casino was a casino located in the Nikto Sector of the moon Nar Shaddaa, during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. It was abandoned by the time of the Cold War, when the Kintan Kings gang used it as a slave market until the Republic attacked and dismantled their operation.
The Fate's Hand Casino appears in the Republic mission "Slave Raiding" on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
